1111101011100111 1000101101111001 0 -> sum: 1000011001100000, cout: 1

0101000100001110 0110110011111101 0 -> sum: 1011111000001011, cout: 0
0010001100010111 1110010101000000 0 -> sum: 0000100001010111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
